trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for an operation.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos chamados durante a geração de contrato, que podem ser usados para modificar o código gerado para uma operação.

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> interface on an operation behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: Implementar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> interface em um comportamento de operação (um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> tipo) para que você possa modificar o código gerado quando um contrato ou o ponto de extremidade é compilado em código.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> insere um comportamento de operação personalizada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção durante a chamada para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> method that adds a string to the comments section of the operation using the <xref:System.CodeDom?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra a implementação do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> método que adiciona uma cadeia de caracteres para a seção de comentários da operação usando o <xref:System.CodeDom?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the operation behavior that implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> is inserted into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra como o comportamento da operação que implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> é inserido no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção durante a chamada para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the following code example shows the operation generated in both Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, o exemplo de código a seguir mostra a operação gerada em Visual Basic e c#.

trans-unit.source: The working context that contains the <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> types necessary to modify the generated operation.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de trabalho que contém os tipos de <see cref="N:System.CodeDom" /> necessários para modificar a operação gerada.

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: Implemente para modificar o modelo de objeto do documento de código antes do processo de geração de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> insere um comportamento de operação personalizada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção durante a chamada para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> method is called once for each contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> método é chamado uma vez para cada contrato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> method that adds a string to the comments section of the operation using the <xref:System.CodeDom?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra a implementação do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension.GenerateOperation%2A> método que adiciona uma cadeia de caracteres para a seção de comentários da operação usando o <xref:System.CodeDom?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the operation behavior that implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> is inserted into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra como o comportamento da operação que implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension> é inserido no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção durante a chamada para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the following code example shows the operation generated in both Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, o exemplo de código a seguir mostra a operação gerada em Visual Basic e c#.
